ground_truth.thought: 探究共享经济在医疗行业的应用前景
ground_truth.name: MedicalResearch.gather_shared_economy_data

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'MedicalResearch.gather_shared_economy_data', 'description': 'Gather data on the application of shared economy in the healthcare sector.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The query to search for shared economy cases in healthcare.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'case_studies', 'description': 'A list of 10 successful shared healthcare cases.'}, {'name': 'patient_satisfaction', 'description': 'Patient satisfaction data from 2021-2023 for major shared healthcare platforms.'}, {'name': 'regulatory_process', 'description': 'The approval process for shared healthcare by medical regulators.'}, {'name': 'market_share', 'description': 'The projected market share of shared healthcare for the next five years.'}, {'name': 'qualifications', 'description': 'Requirements for conducting shared healthcare services.'}]}]
我是一名医疗行业分析师，打算探究共享经济在医疗行业的应用前景。首先，我需要获取10个国内外成功的共享医疗案例。然后，收集2021-2023年主要共享医疗平台的患者满意度数据。接着，了解医疗监管部门对共享医疗的审批流程。最后，通过医疗行业数据获取未来五年共享医疗的市场份额，并获取一些开展共享医疗服务的资质要求。当前这一步的目标是什么?
探究共享经济在医疗行业的应用前景
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'q'的值是什么?

{'case_studies': ['Case 1: Telemedicine platform in the US', 'Case 2: Medical equipment sharing in Europe', 'Case 3: Health app in Asia', 'Case 4: Patient data sharing in Australia', 'Case 5: Remote consultation service in Africa', 'Case 6: Health insurance sharing in South America', 'Case 7: Medical research collaboration in Canada', 'Case 8: Health education platform in the Middle East', 'Case 9: Health monitoring devices sharing in Russia', 'Case 10: Health emergency response in India'], 'patient_satisfaction': {'2021': 85, '2022': 87, '2023': 89}, 'regulatory_process': 'Approval by local health authorities and compliance with data protection laws.', 'market_share': {'2024': 10, '2025': 12, '2026': 15, '2027': 18, '2028': 20}, 'qualifications': ['Certified healthcare provider', 'Data security certification', 'Compliance with health regulations', 'Professional medical staff', 'Quality assurance in services']}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'case_studies': ['Case 1: Telemedicine platform in the US', 'Case 2: Medical equipment sharing in Europe', 'Case 3: Health app in Asia', 'Case 4: Patient data sharing in Australia', 'Case 5: Remote consultation service in Africa', 'Case 6: Health insurance sharing in South America', 'Case 7: Medical research collaboration in Canada', 'Case 8: Health education platform in the Middle East', 'Case 9: Health monitoring devices sharing in Russia', 'Case 10: Health emergency response in India'], 'patient_satisfaction': {'2021': 85, '2022': 87, '2023': 89}, 'regulatory_process': 'Approval by local health authorities and compliance with data protection laws.', 'market_share': {'2024': 10, '2025': 12, '2026': 15, '2027': 18, '2028': 20}, 'qualifications': ['Certified healthcare provider', 'Data security certification', 'Compliance with health regulations', 'Professional medical staff', 'Quality assurance in services']}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?

prediction: 当前这一步的目标是搜集和整理共享医疗领域的成功案例、患者满意度数据、医疗监管审批流程、未来五年市场份额预测，以及开展共享医疗服务所需的资质要求。这些信息将帮助分析共享经济在医疗行业的应用前景。
